reviewText:
Can't afford expensive lessons?
Get this for the children and early teens.
Have them follow this DVD in their gi or workout clothes
on a regular schedule once or twice a week.

Great for children's basic fitness too!
A GREAT introduction to the fighting art and sport of Tae Kwon Do.
My children and I really enjoyed this video.  I would definitely recommend it to anyone, especially children, interested in learning more about Tae Kwon Do.
Maybe my expectations were too high. This video isn't meant for younger kids. It expected a few repetitions to help gain the fundamentals versus all the other non-important videos.
